title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.1 - Who may request transfer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.1 - Who may request transfer

State Regulations
A patient may be transferred from one inpatient facility to
another inpatient facility of the same class by order of the commissioner upon
written request for such order by the patient or any other interested
party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
17.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
